Header.title: At last, the tattoo artist app
Header.description: With Inked you have the control. Do your budgets easily, fastly and allow your clients to find a date the best suits them based on your agenda.

Features.subtitle: Features
Features.titleMobile: Do the tattoo, leave all the rest with us
Features.description1: Count on all our technology, so that you only concerned with tattooing than with the
Features.description2: bureaucracy of scheduling, budgeting and payments.

FeatureCardsData.card1_text: Regardless of the way you work, Inked adapts to you
FeatureCardsData.card2_text: Select the dates and times you are available, and let your customers choose the day that best suits them
FeatureCardsData.card3_text: Our App learn how you do your budgets to help you on that step.

OurTools.description1: The facility of the digital world has finally arrived for tattoo artists. Now only those who really want, will receive a budget by email, WhatsApp or social networks.

Community.subtitle: Community
Community.description: Our goal is for you to spend more time tattooing than with the bureaucratic part of dealing with clients and organizing your schedule according to their needs. With Inked you are at the center

LearnMore.subtitle: Join us
LearnMore.titleDesktop: Welcome to the tattoo world revolution
LearnMore.titleMobile: Welcome to the tattoo world revolution
LearnMore.description: Find out what Inked can do for you. Centralize budgets, calendars and messages and payments in one place. Sign up for more details
